Core Features

Built for developers, trusted by enterprises

Multi-Model Access

Access GPT-4, Claude 3, Llama 3, and more through a single unified API

  • GPT-4 and GPT-3.5 Turbo
  • Claude 3 Opus and Sonnet
  • Llama 3 70B
  • Automatic model routing
  • Fallback mechanisms

Enterprise Security

Bank-level security with end-to-end encryption and compliance

  • SOC 2 Type II certified
  • TLS 1.3 encryption in transit
  • AES-256 encryption at rest
  • GDPR and CCPA compliant
  • Regular security audits

Smart Rate Limiting

Intelligent rate limiting based on your subscription tier

  • Per-minute request limits
  • Concurrent request management
  • Automatic throttling
  • Real-time usage monitoring
  • Upgrade notifications

Auto-Scaling Infrastructure

Handle millions of requests with automatic scaling

  • Horizontal auto-scaling
  • Load balancing
  • Global CDN
  • 99.9% uptime SLA
  • Zero-downtime deployments

Real-Time Analytics

Monitor usage, performance, and costs in real-time

  • Request tracking
  • Response time metrics
  • Token usage analytics
  • Cost breakdown
  • Custom dashboards

Secure History Storage

Encrypted storage of all prompts and responses

  • Encrypted at rest
  • Tier-based retention
  • Easy export options
  • Search and filter
  • Automatic cleanup

Quick Start Example

import { GenAI } from '@genai/sdk';

const client = new GenAI({
  apiKey: process.env.GENAI_API_KEY
});

const response = await client.chat.create({
  model: 'gpt-4',
  messages: [
    { role: 'user', content: 'Hello, world!' }
  ]
});

console.log(response.content);
